name: Penguin Patrol Free
description:
WADDLE WE DO?
Baby penguins are stranded on thin ice, and it's up to the Penguin Patrol to save them!

Featured by Apple in over 100 countries!

"Cute visuals and attempting to earn the max score is quite challenging." - Gamezebo
"9/10. The controls are very simple and easy to pickup" - AppScore
"The audio is so relaxing and harmless, you can’t help by smile and have a warm glow." - AppZilla

PAY WHAT YOU WANT TO REMOVE ADS
The entire game is completely FREE. If you're enjoying the game, please consider supporting the developers by removing ads - and you decide how much to pay!

THINK OR SINK
Solve over 75 puzzling levels and encounter several types of penguins, each with their own unique personality. But watch out- the thin ice breaks with each step you take. Can you earn 3 stars and unlock all the achievements?

THE 'ICEST CONTROLS
Swiftly maneuver across three perilous types of ice using the intuitive slide and hold controls. Made a mistake? Simply Undo your last step whenever you like.

Do you have what it takes to be part of the Penguin Patrol?
